title: Fawad meets PM; discusses political situation, info ministry reforms
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 17 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Thursday met Prime Minister Imran Khan here and discussed overall political situation particularly the prevailing tension in political sphere.
They also discussed the recently announced federal budget 2021-22.
The federal minister also apprised the prime minister of development projects and progress in the reforms process of the information ministry.
